entry.def: If people are indoctrinated, they are taught a particular belief with the aim that they will reject other beliefs.

example.ex: I wouldn't say that she was trying to indoctrinate us.
example.tran: 我不认为她在竭力向我们灌输一种信仰。

means.word_mean: 1. teaching someone to accept doctrines uncritically
